# NSWindow.UserTabbingPreference.manual

**Case**

A value that indicates a window should display as tabs according to the window’s tabbing mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case manual
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/tabbingMode-swift.property].

## Constants

- **NSWindow.UserTabbingPreference.always**: A value that indicates a window should always display as tabs.
- **NSWindow.UserTabbingPreference.inFullScreen**: A value that indicates a window should only display as tabs when in full-screen mode.
